metadata.name: Moriah
metadata.description:
[h1]Moriah[/h1] A simple mod for the Binding of Isaac: Rebirth, that adds a handful of simple items.
In current total, the mod adds 13 passive/active collectibles, 2 trinkets, 1 card, and a transformation.
[h2]Catalog[/h2] [h3]Passive Items[/h3] [b]Bowtie[/b] - [i]"HP up + you feel charming"[/i] - Health and charm tears. [b]Coffee Bean[/b] - [i]"Speed Up"[/i] - Speed up! [b]Fishbowl[/b] - [i]"blub blub blub"[/i] - Trade tears for protection form projectiles.
[b]Oil Lamp[/b] - [i]"I've got the black lung, pop."[/i] - Familiar [b]Plant[/b] - [i]"plaaaaant"[/i] - Familiar
[b]Baker's Apron[/b] - [i]"Bake me a cake as fast as you can"[/i] - Deal damage for Damage. [b]Butcher's Apron[/b] - [i]"How could you be so mean?"[/i] - Heal yourself for Tears. [b]Chander's Apron[/b] - [i]"Jack be nimble, Jack be quick"[/i] - Charge active items for Shot Speed.
[h3]Active Items[/h3] [b]Eggs[/b] - [i]"6-Pack!"[/i] - Throw some eggs. [b]Helium[/b] - [i]"I be a wee little Leprechaun!"[/i] - Balloons can protect and give flight. [b]Hymnal[/b] - [i]"Bored again Christian"[/i] - Bore the entire room, temporary freeze. [b]Lunchbox[/b] - [i]"Stay Fresh!â„¢"[/i] - Stash your stuff for later. [b]Whistle[/b] - [i]"Rock you like a Whirlwind"[/i] - Use the wind to get around.
[h3]Trinkets[/h3] [b]Oven Mitt[/b] - Walk through fire. [b]Tissues[/b] - Dries tears, but also cleans the floor.
[h3]Cards[/h3] [b]Old Maid[/b] - Keeps what is found, deals equivalent damage.
